property.name: fromObjectApiName
property.label: Target Object API Name
property.description: API name of the object to query records from.

property.name: relatedFieldApiName
property.label: Target Field API Name
property.description: API name of the field that relates to the target object.

property.name: sourceFieldApiName
property.label: Source Field API Name
property.description: API name of the field on the current record used in the query's WHERE clause.

property.name: fields
property.label: Fields to Display (comma separated)
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields to display in the table.

property.name: orderBy
property.label: Fields to Order By (comma separated)
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields to sort by, with optional ASC or DESC.

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name (e.g., 'standard:account')
property.description: Icon to use, defaults to the target object's icon if not specified.

property.name: showNewButton
property.label: Show [ New ] Button
property.description: Show or hide the [ New ] button at the top of the list.

property.name: showViewAll
property.label: Show [ View All ] Link
property.description: Show or hide the [ View All ] link, only for parent-child relationships.
